summary: Ingrid is a beautiful Standalone mage Nord follower who can be found on Markaarth
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/pTGm54c.png[/img][size=6][b]
[color=#c27ba0]INGRID CORAZÓN JUSTO[/color][/b][/size]
[youtube]4HfIjhlhjlg[/youtube][/center]

[color=#c27ba0]Sorry for my english, it's not my native languaje, i will put the descriptions in Spanish and then in english using the google translator...[/color]


[b]In Spanish:[/b] Su edad es desconocida, Ingrid fue parte del colegio de magos de Hibernalia durante su juventud, fue compañera de clases del hoy conocido como el Augur de Dunlain con quien compartio muchos experimentos y conocimientos sobre la magia, pero sufrio un accidente durante sus investigaciones perdiendo parte de su alma, desde ese dia Ingrid se volvio una mujer incapaz de morir por medios naturales, la edad y el paso del tiempo dejaron de afectar su apariencia y la muerte jamas llego a ella por vejez, aunque se desconoce si es mortal o no, pues nunca pudo ser asesinada por algun oponente.
Tras su accidente, y los hechos posteriores que acontecerian en el colegio, justo cuando el Augur de Dunlain perdio su forma corporea, Ingrid fue expulsada del colegio, volviendose una maga errante.
Durante años trabajo como mercenaria ayudando a aventureros o investigadores a adentrarse en antiguas ruinas, con ello Ingrid enriquecia su conocimiento y ademas lograba conseguir metodos economicos para subsistir, aunque su ambicion de sabiduria llevo a la mujer a explorar gran cantidad de ruinas en Cyrodiil y Skyrim, actualmente se encuentra en Markaarth puesto que hay mucho que investigar alli y muchos conocimientos que podrian serle de utilidad, aunque siempre esta disponible para adentrarse en cuevas o ruinas con tal de aprender un poco mas y fortalecer su magia.

In English: (Google Translation) Hers age is unknown, Ingrid was a member of the college of Winterhold during her youth, was classmate of today known as the Augur of Dunlain with whom she shared many experiments and knowledge about magic, but suffered an accident during investigations losing part of her soul, from that day Ingrid is incapable of dying by natural means, age and time are returned ceased to affect her appearance and death never came to her old age, although it is unknown if she can die by a sword or not.
After her accident, and subsequent events that would occur at school, just as the Augur of Dunlain lost his corporeal form, Ingrid was expelled from school, becoming a magician wandering.
For years she work as a mercenary helping adventurers and researchers to delve into ancient ruins, thereby Ingrid enriched her knowledge and also could get methods to survive, but her ambition of wisdom took the woman to explore lots of ruins in Cyrodiil and Skyrim. She is currently in Markaarth as much to investigate and there are many skills that could be useful, but she is always available to go into caves or ruins just to learn a bit more and strengthen her magic.

[color=#c27ba0][size=2][b]ABOUT INGRID[/b][/size][/color]
Combat Style: Destruction Mage
LVL: auto. (min lvl 10, max lvl 80)
Spells: Stoneflesh, Chain Lightning, Firebolt, Lightning Bolt, Close Wounds, Fast Healing, Steadfast Ward, and Turn Undead. (exactly the same as Marcurio)
Location: Markaarth market (during the day), Silver Bood inn (in the night)
Start Equipment: Custom armor and Elven Sword


[size=5][b][color=#c27ba0]FAQ[/color]
[/b][/size][b]CAN YOU MAKE MORE BODY TYPES?:[/b]
Maybe, I don't know
[b]HER DRESS IS BROKEN/INVISIBLE:[/b]
Save in front of her, load a older save and then reload the save with her... if it doesn't work, use the non custom dress version, I don't know how to fix it.
[b]I DON'T LIKE SHE IS NEVERNUDE!:[/b]
She will not be officially naked
